DOC.brief_summary: To assess the comparative efficacy of sertraline versus venlafaxine XR on measures of quality of life.
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison of Sertraline Versus Venlafaxine XR in the Treatment of Major Depression
DOC.criteria: Primary diagnosis of DSMIV Major Depressive Disorder, single episode or recurrent, without psychotic features. Additional DSMIV Axis I diagnoses will be permitted only if they are identified as secondary diagnoses. HamiltonDepression rating scale (HAMD; 17 item) total score ≥18 and HAMD item 1 (depressed mood) score ≥2. Use of an antidepressant within 2 weeks of baseline (4 weeks for fluoxetine) Current or past diagnosis of bipolar disorder or any psychotic disorder.
